channel.title: takeshita dori on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in takeshita dori on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Rainbow Candyfloss
item.description: There are countless businesses producing a myriad products I just cannot see being viable anywhere othere than Tokyo. Long may they all thrive. This Totti Candy Factory Rainbow Candyfloss is one such product many enjoy on Takeshita Dori in Harajuku.
